lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: 53% of the world lives on less than $2/day. I live off over $100/day. It's kinda obvious that those with more should help those with less.
lender.occupational_info: I create web sites.

lender.name: German
lender.loan_because: I like to help people
lender.occupational_info: I am an Insurance agent also I'm a Realtor buying and selling properties and I help people to prepare their taxes

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: We are grateful to loan !

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I spent 7 years traveling with my husband,a humanitarian, to the third world helping people in Cambodia, Thailand, Honduras, Haiti, Poland while it was behind the Iron Curtain and Africa. My heart connects to the people I met.
lender.occupational_info: Helping a humanitarian do his work all over the third world.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: It puts my "problems" in perspective and connects me to the larger world.
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to make advertisements for businesses and non-profit organizations.

lender.name: Alicia

lender.name: Rick

lender.occupational_info: I am a computer-aided design specialist and do engineering contract work.

lender.name: Monika
lender.loan_because: I admire people who are entepreneourial. I want to help them as much as I can with puthing their ideas into practice.

lender.loan_because: I know what my money is doing.

lender.occupation: Retired teacher/Project Read Coordinator for libra

lender.occupational_info: I am now retired from teaching. Presently became the Project Read Coordinator for the Ouachita Parish Library System. Also tutor in the afternoons for the First Baptist Church.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur who would like to give others a chance to succeed. I'm blessed to live in America, a land of freedom and opportunity. (With desire and discipline, ANYONE may succeed here.) Because I know that life in many other countries can be more of a challenge, perhaps this is a way to help a few people get started in business.
lender.occupational_info: For many years I have owned and operated a successful marketing, advertising and public relations business. I still work in that field, but now spend most of my time as a singer and songwriter.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: Seems like a great way to push back poverty. Hand-up not a Hand- out

lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse, who is studying to become a doctor

lender.loan_because: help individuals in developing countries have a better life

lender.occupational_info: I look after elderly people so they can live in their own homes.

I learn math, language, zoology, geography, and geometry.

lender.loan_because: We have visited Africa and met with a Kiva partner - and it WORKS! Assisting a single entrepreneur helps the entire community, the spin off benefits are enormous.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I want to help women and children improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work from my home. I go to different places and then write a report on what they are doing correctly or incorrectly. This is so they can improve what they are doing.

lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in so many ways in my life and I just want to share.

lender.name: Seton

lender.occupational_info: I promote musicians

lender.occupational_info: Marketing

lender.occupational_info: I study hard in the hopes of earning a degree in International Business Administration.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: It's a small gamble for a larger good and my way of repaying those that I have lost track of over the years. .

lender.name: Wittmer

lender.occupational_info: opening minds

lender.name: Commodore
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Gilles

lender.occupational_info: At first computer engineer, then management consultant, coach for several firms, trainer in human communicaton and finally psycho-therapist. I have time to read, to write short stories, to hike, to spend time with friends and people and to give my time too...

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: it gives me great satisfaction that my loan can have such a positive impact in improving the lives of others around the world. I feel my money is reaping benefits as it is contributing toward self -sufficiency, and enabling people to better support themselves and their families. I enjoy being able to select whom to lend money to, and for what purpose.
lender.occupational_info: I recently retired. I was privileged to work for many years as a social worker with our nation's veterans.

lender.name: Paulette
lender.loan_because: I want to share with people who live in countries in which I have studied and traveled. KIVA gives me a way to promote sustainable life for all on earth.
lender.occupational_info: I teach international business and environmental law and sustainability for business. My research and writing are about tools that promote sustainable development including Fair Trade, microfinance, local production, and organics. Fair Trade and microloans level the playing field of business and give people a "hand up" instead of a hand out. Please join my students and fellow MSU folks on the Spartan Global Development Network!

lender.name: Michelle and Kristian
lender.loan_because: when you reach out and touch a heart or a life, the world changes.

lender.name: Tobias
lender.loan_because: I want to pay it forward!

lender.loan_because:
I get more than I need, having the chance to live in Western Europe and getting more opportunities to earn my living. I think it is normal giving a bit of my money to create opportunities to others.
Recibo mas que necesito porque vivo en Europe del Oeste y tengo mas opportunitades ganar mi vida, creo que es normal dar un poco de mi dinero para ayudar otros crecer tambien.
Je reois plus que ncessaire pour vivre car j'ai la chance de vivre en Europe de L'Ouest o je rencontre plus d'opportunits pour me dvelopper et je trouve normal de donner un peu de mon surplus pour que d'autres se dveloppent aussi.

lender.name: Sabina
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Yolene

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed during my time on earth and do not take it for granted. And I loan because it's the most direct way for me to connect in the most human way with other brother's and sisters around the globe that truly need our help.
lender.occupational_info: Part of my work is to learn; so that I can continue to teach my children; and pass on my knowledge to the next fellow man or woman.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed want to share directly with others who need some help.
lender.occupational_info: Work for NBC Universal.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage entrepreneurs around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: we're interdependent
lender.occupational_info: Poet

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I want to help those that want to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: improving quality of life through the use of medicine

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: of my small business experience and my experience in the small business sector in the US Peace Corps. The toughest job to have is a private business. I'm fortunate enough to be able to offer some $, but they are doing all the work.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of middle school mathematics in an English speaking private school in Hong Kong.

lender.name: Sis Chrys
lender.loan_because: I enjoy giving what I can to others. I will never be rich, but I will help when and where I can.
lender.occupational_info: When someone has a problem with getting something on their computer to work they call me.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I got to where I am by a combination of my own hard work and the help of others. This is one way I can pay back the world for what I have received and help others who are working hard towards their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I program Internet websites.

lender.name: Sonja
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference for other women in less privileged countries.
lender.occupational_info: I help build rockets that fly into space and the satellites that they carry.

lender.name: Tonia
lender.loan_because: I am my brother's keeper. We all should be.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I wanted to bless others because I have been blessed.

lender.name: Ines
lender.loan_because: My previous work in international development was often disconnected from the people who were meant to benefit from my efforts. This is an easy and innovative way to both help someone *and* achieve the personal satisfaction of witnessing direct impacts.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe in the value of self promotion and self respect. A leg up, not a handout.

lender.name: Peter-Jan
lender.occupational_info: www.eximo.nl

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: It matters....
lender.occupational_info: I teach business at a University based in Cambridge, MA.

lender.name: Derrick
lender.loan_because: I have traveled the world working on the world's largest sporting events and have seen the need to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in event operations on events like FIFA World Cup, Super Bowls, NASCAR and the Olympics. I've had the fortune to work with athletes from all over the world and have shared many fun, enriching experiences with them.

lender.name: Mark Whiting
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to make the world a better place but murder is illegal.
lender.occupational_info: I help people and organisations make better decisions by using design research and methods.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I believe women helping women is the greatest force for change in this world!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a US Govt Subcontractor, administering US Navy contracts.

lender.name: Rocky and Julie
lender.loan_because: I love being able to help someone get a foothold in life to be able to feed their family and get supplies needed to live.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I am always searching for responsible ways to share what I have without imposing my ideals on indigenous peoples. Micro-lending through local organizations is the best way I've found so far!
lender.occupational_info: I am an Associate Pastor at a United Methodist Church

lender.name: mary ellen
lender.occupational_info: I design homes

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because:
I can.
There isn't a fixed amount of wealth in the world, and I'm all in favour of helping people to help themselves to create more of it.

lender.name: Cady
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel like I am making somebody happy and helping them achieve their dreams. I feel more connected to the world this way. It also makes me feel grateful for my life and what I have in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach fifth grade (10 and 11 year-olds) in Saratoga, CA in the United States of America.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I think microfinance is one of the only ways to empower impoverished people and significantly improve the economies of the developing counties in which they live.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Davidson College, a liberal arts school in North Carolina. During my time here, I hope to educate my peers about microcredit through our growing microfinance club which began in 2007.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage capitalism, entrepreneurship, risk taking and trade, and enhance the opportunities people have made for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I advise governments and companies about transport strategy and policy.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I love my neighbor as myself
lender.occupational_info: I serve

lender.name: J. Mark
lender.loan_because: my Lord incarnate brings healing to every facet of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a humanitarian educator at heart. At present, I work in a center for economic development that develops strategies and offers training for the local church to empower the poor economically, socially, and spiritually.

lender.name: Mariela
lender.loan_because: I have a fervent interest in international development and microfinance, especially as it applies to Latin America. Having traveled abroad, studied abroad, volunteered abroad, and perhaps most personally significant having been born and raised abroad, I feel a particularly strong imperative to work towards creating an inspired global community working towards a common good. Little by little we can help break the cycle of poverty!
lender.occupational_info:
I am currently a Kiva Fellow serving in Bolivia with Kiva's Field Partner, CIDRE
To support CIDRE's efforts, please join the Friends of CIDRE lending team: http://www.kiva.org/team/cidre

lender.name: Kathika
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to help entrepreneurs in developing countries build business on their own.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a travel blogger and I write about interesting places across the globe for people to explore

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive. --Elbert Hubbard
lender.occupational_info: I make software for the Medical field.

lender.name: Jide
lender.loan_because: I believe we're stronger working together than we are apart.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a computer technician. I support large networks of computers and users to provide stable systems and pleasant work experiences.

lender.name: Boutique Mix and MiMi
lender.loan_because: I am blessed beyond measure and happy to share my blessings. Every single cent counts towards enriching the lives of entrepreneurs whose main goal is to improve the lives of their families and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney, accountant, fashion boutique owner and stylist. I am blessed to own a fashion boutique, Boutique Mix and enjoy running my own business (www.boutiquemix.com). I am also an Independent Stylist with Stella & Dot (www.stelladot.com/mimidabo). I combine my love for fashion and charity work by contributing a portion of all my business profits to KIVA and other deserving organizations that enrich lives of entrepreneurs in developing countries.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: having money without making a difference is valueless money

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to create a life of abundance and fulfillment
lender.occupational_info: I help people to pursue and achieve their dreams through building teams and creating partnerships of cooperation and love.

lender.name: Infinite Potential
lender.loan_because: a Big portion of the meaning of life is about giving and the more we can give the greater meaning to our life
lender.occupational_info: We are a centre that teaches people how they can utilise their body for Empowerment Well Being Growth Evolution and Transformation

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I am blessed. I know how important it is to be able to work.
lender.occupational_info: I evaluate job options for people, some who have disabilities.

lender.name: Hans & Carrie
lender.loan_because: We are committed to giving others an opportunity to reach their potential
lender.occupational_info: We are both educators one directing external affairs for an international school in Paris and the other working with social entrepreneurs through a business school.

lender.name: RMRG Hidalgo
lender.loan_because: why not?!

lender.name: Adam & Joy
lender.loan_because: we have been blessed by God and want to be a blessing to others in return. We pray that the love of Jesus Christ be shown through our giving.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I feel a connection to other women who work with their hands to make beautiful things.
lender.occupational_info: I made draperies, pillows, bedding and custom slipcovers for furniture. My work is all custom made one of a kind pieces. I have some good connections in the decorating business.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: helping people to improve their own lives is more effective in the longer term than providing short term assistance. And small businesses not only help the owner, but the whole community.
lender.occupational_info: computer programmer

lender.name: Zoica
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving back
lender.occupational_info: As a fashion designer, my creations aspire to be a reflection of my emotional connection with the environment and people, while contributing to positive change.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Those who are fortunate enough to help themselves should come to the aid of those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Texas at Austin. I am currently doing a dual-degree in Urban Studies and Civil Engineering.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I have the opportunity to be an entrepreneur with my craft (sewing) and want to provide the same opportunity to others.

lender.name: Beach Money Profits
lender.loan_because: "Beach Money" by Jordan Adler is a book about creating success in network marketing. It only seemed right to use 100% of the profits from the sale of this book to empower entrepreneurs all over the world.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity to return a gracious kindness.
lender.occupational_info: I help build special braces for kids that have been born with problems.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: God put all of us here to do something.

lender.name: Maya
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Payback time for all the help I've received from others over the years.
lender.occupational_info: I'm 59, my wife and I have 2 sons and 5 grandkids. I work nights stocking shelves in a supermarket.

lender.name: jean
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I love blessing others. It brings me abundant joy.
lender.occupational_info: Now I volunteer at church, on political campaigns and in my community.

lender.name: Mattias
lender.loan_because: the concept of Kiva is amazing. Everyone deserves a break!
lender.occupational_info: Selling stuff

lender.name: Erasmo
lender.occupational_info: Uh...not much to it. Sand, beach, bum.

lender.name: Yolande
lender.loan_because: I'm glad to be able to help people with their projects.
lender.occupational_info: I train people from stores, supermarkets... to use computers and computer's programms at their jobs. I like to explain to others :)

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: My business is focused on the support of SMEs.
lender.occupational_info: I became involved in micro finance when helping support the growth of a local charity, www.microloanfoundation.org.uk

lender.name: Marie-Jeanne
lender.loan_because: This whole idea is so beautiful, one can only be enthusiastic to make it live! Kiva gives me the opportunity to concretely help someone "over there". And it also offers me a real feeling of belonging to a worlwide community.

lender.name: Martyn
lender.loan_because: Stupid not to..Given the opportunity these folks will work their way out of poverty. For every one you help get going think of their extended family and friends you are also helping. It also gives them dignity and a sense of fulfilment in doing it !
lender.occupational_info: small scale serial entrepreneur..fingers in pies, multiple revenue streams. I do a bit of this and that which includes teaching, selling on the internet, and a few other things.

lender.name: Susana
lender.loan_because: I believe in creating opportunities.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to improve their lot in life
lender.occupational_info: Help look after people's retirement savings

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I haven't made any loans yet!
lender.occupational_info: I work in network and computer security. The goal is to basically protect data and information or money from electronic theft.

lender.name: Pilo
lender.loan_because: I am privileged to be able to help people who are helping themselves.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: no matter where we live in the world, we all basically want the same thing: to earn an honest living and to support our families.

lender.name: Lin
lender.loan_because: I love to encourage people who are working to better themselves and their situation. I've worked outside my home since I was 11. I started my first full-time business in 1988. I'm drawn to people who take charge of their situation and add value to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I write how-to books and publish them on the Internet. Every day I write blogs or articles to promote my work on the Internet, so more people can learn about it and how to improve their lives. This is how I support myself and others.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their lives by supporting themselves and their families by their own means. As the bible says it is better to teach a man to fish....
lender.occupational_info: I help people purchase and finance their homes and investment properties.

lender.name: Mattias
lender.occupational_info: In my work I help companies improve their business. I am married, and I have one daughter.

lender.name: Loraine
lender.loan_because: We are commanded to love one another just as our Lord loves us - John 13:34
lender.occupational_info: I am a Real Estate Agent and I love helping people find their dream home!

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I was in business for myself and could not have grown and been successful without credit. I have to do the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: I am doing special events for a local needlework store and volunteer work, including presentations on micro finance.

lender.name: Jonas
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship is a beautiful thing, especially if it also benefit ones community. If there is just a slight chance I can help entrepreneurs around the world do this I'm all in.
lender.occupational_info:
I have together with my colleagues created a technology that allows anyone to edit a video on a webpage, without downloading any programs.
My goal is to democratize video editing. To give everyone in the world the possibility to express themselves with video.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I hope it helps

lender.name: Hussain/Siddiqi Family
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be in a position to make positive difference in someone's life, however small that may be. Small individual acts of good have a potential to make a huge impact on humanity.

lender.name: Brian & Sarah
lender.loan_because: I can. I've been greatly blessed with comfort and even some abundance here and there and I'm duty-bound as a Christian to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze and publish data that helps my business perform better

lender.name: Paulo Adrio
lender.loan_because: "We must be the change we wish to see" Gandhi

lender.name: Katy & Dan
lender.occupation: Katy: graduate student Dan: research scientist

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I believe that small changes to help women can end up making large changes in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a software and hardware company that develops electronic monitoring for people.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: Just one entrepreneur can make a difference in a developing market
lender.occupational_info: I provide outsourced bookkeeping and accounting services to small businesses around Washington, DC, USA. I also provide business development consulting services.

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: This is the best form of 'recycling' I've ever encountered. It is great to be able to participate in a global movement at such a personal level.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a library at a college in the Northeast US. I also paint, teach art, and have a really busy family.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to help single women like myself accomplish their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I'm fortunate enough to have an amazing job that I love and which enables me to travel all over the world.

lender.name: Mike and Jean
lender.loan_because: To share what I have

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing to do!

lender.name: Randi
lender.loan_because: i love knowing i can help someone directly in making their dream a reality. I look forward to a successful partnership with people all over the world!

lender.name: chrissy
lender.loan_because: we are here to help each other get by.....

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: good people deserve a chance to succeed.

lender.name: jab
lender.loan_because: It works.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a scientist working on technology-based development projects.

lender.name: Paul
lender.occupational_info: Making wooden furniture. Beds, tables, chairs, clocks as well as bars & pantries.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I need a capital to put up my own small BPO (Business Processing and Outsourcing) Company. I am currently working as a freelance Virtual Agent and as time passes by, I have encountered a lot of clients that i cannot handle anymore thus needing to hire some assistants.
lender.occupational_info: I offer outsourcing services such as technical / customer support, telemarketing, research and more...

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: It gives me great satisfaction to help those who want to help themselves. I am encouraged by those who want to work and be productive.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Changed minds must precede changed behavior. Those that can must lead by example. it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Singularly focused on greenhouse gas emission reduction

lender.name: Melina
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves and each other.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage the development of computer software.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: This is the kind of globalization the world needs!
lender.occupational_info: I am now disabled and have had to give up the work I did in the past. I am now going to school to develop skills that will enable me to work again, hopefully teaching English to Spanish speakers. I will not earn a lot of money, but enough to make my life more comfortable. In my country, I am poor. But I am not as poor as most of the people who seek loans.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy

lender.name: Martyn
lender.loan_because: helping people to help themselves and build their immediate community has a more positive and sustainable impact than simply throwing money at a problem.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a construction company that builds residential homes.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: we donate 10% of our profits to charity and Kiva is a great way to help people.
lender.occupational_info: We provide environmental consulting services.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs in developing nations achieve their goals and dreams. By loaning money, these entrepreneurs are gaining business acumen, which is invaluable for what they can do to prosper in their future.
lender.occupational_info: College Student

lender.name: Morty Pants
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I have so much, why shouldn't I share with those who don't?
lender.occupational_info: I try to love people just the way they are. I work with construction teams from the States and I hang out with teenagers.

lender.name: Anar
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Misty
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do to help make this world a better place for all human beings.

lender.name: Dennis & Shirley
lender.loan_because: I like to see people suceed. In my life I have met so many persons who with just a littie help from a friend have brought joy to their family. We have so much in the United States to share with others. I hope to bring hope and health to others by sharing a little of what i have. I am loaning our Stimulus payment and any gratuities I may receive as a tax preparer.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, take care of my home, and sometimes work as an AARP volunteer tax preparer.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
